 Talic wields a sword and shield and uses Whirlwind and Leap.
 Korlic wields a massive polearm and uses Cleave and Furious Charge.
 Madawc dual-wields axes and uses Weapon Throw and Seismic Slam.

passive.name: Pound of Flesh
passive.description: When you are healed by a health globe, gain 2% Life regeneration per second and 4% increased movement speed for 15 seconds. This bonus stacks up to 5 times.
passive.descriptionHtml: When you are healed by a health globe, gain 2% Life regeneration per second and 4% increased movement speed for 15 seconds. This bonus stacks up to 5 times.
passive.flavorText: "When the sky bleeds, the crops grow tall. When our enemies bleed, we grow strong." �Chant of the Harvest

passive.name: Ruthless
passive.description: You deal 40% additional damage to enemies below 30% health.
passive.descriptionHtml: You deal 40% additional damage to enemies below 30% health.
passive.flavorText: The clans each paint their warriors in their own unique way. Some celebrate the mountain, others honor the fire, but the Targos clan worships the purifying virtue of pain.

passive.name: Nerves of Steel
passive.description:
Fatal damage instead reduces you to 15% Life. For 3 seconds afterward, you take 95% reduced damage and are immune to all control-impairing effects.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
passive.descriptionHtml:
Fatal damage instead reduces you to 15% Life. For 3 seconds afterward, you take 95% reduced damage and are immune to all control-impairing effects.

This effect may occur once every 60 seconds.
passive.flavorText: "The trials begin with childhood; skinning ferocious beasts, climbing windswept cliffs and carrying weapons heavy enough to make a southern soldier weep. Is it any wonder that they never give ground?" �Sir Aric of Duncraig

passive.name: Weapons Master
passive.description:
Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:
Swords/Daggers: 8% increased damage
Maces/Axes: 5% Critical Hit Chance
Polearms/Spears: 8% attack speed
Mighty Weapons: 2 Fury per hit
passive.descriptionHtml:
Gain a bonus based on the weapon type of your main hand weapon:

Swords/Daggers: 8% increased damage

Maces/Axes: 5% Critical Hit Chance

Polearms/Spears: 8% attack speed

Mighty Weapons: 2 Fury per hit
passive.flavorText: "My men ambushed the traveler in the woods, but it was we who were surprised. Such keen senses, swift motions, flawless strikes. We never stood a chance." �Redjack the Bandit

passive.name: Inspiring Presence
passive.description:
The duration of your shouts is doubled. After using a shout you and all allies within 100 yards regenerate 3% of maximum Life per second for 120 seconds.

Your shouts are:
 Battle Rage
 Threatening Shout
 War Cry

passive.flavorText: "The enemy poured through the gap until Warmaster Karja impaled three demons at once on our battle standard, tossing their corpses into the fray below as she roared a rallying call from high atop the battlements." �The Battle of the Starless Night

passive.name: Berserker Rage
passive.description: You deal 25% additional damage while near maximum Fury.
passive.descriptionHtml: You deal 25% additional damage while near maximum Fury.
passive.flavorText: "You wouldn't like me when I'm angry." �Bannar the Berserker

Heal amount is increased by 1% of your Health Globe Healing Bonus.

passive.flavorText: "Compassion is weakness. To press the advantage when an opponent calls for mercy is the way of true power." �Halaberd the Conqueror

passive.name: Animosity
passive.description:
Increase all Fury generation by 10%.
Increase maximum Fury by 20.

Fury is used to fuel your most powerful attacks.
passive.descriptionHtml:
Increase all Fury generation by 10%.

Increase maximum Fury by 20.

passive.flavorText: "While most orders teach the merits of calming the seas of the soul, the guardians of Arreat have embraced the raging inner storm." �Chronicler Arlavoc

passive.descriptionHtml: Reduce all non-Physical damage by 20%. When you take damage from a ranged or elemental attack, you have a chance to gain 2 Fury.
passive.flavorText: "The sorcery of the west has brought us nothing but blight. Strength built these walls, and strength will hold them." �Gruchac Hammerhand

passive.name: Tough as Nails
passive.description:
Increase Armor by 25%.
Increase Thorns by 100%.
passive.descriptionHtml:
Increase Armor by 25%.

Increase Thorns by 100%.
passive.flavorText: After a while the scars serve as their own layer of armor.

passive.flavorText: "Run if you must, but you'll only die tired." �Ooron Goons

passive.name: Relentless
passive.description: While below 35% Life, all skills cost 50% less Fury, Life per Fury Spent is doubled, and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
passive.descriptionHtml: While below 35% Life, all skills cost 50% less Fury, Life per Fury Spent is doubled, and all damage taken is reduced by 50%.
passive.flavorText: No matter the odds, some warriors simply refuse to fall.

passive.name: Brawler
passive.description: As long as there are 3 enemies within 12 yards, all of your damage is increased by 20%.
passive.descriptionHtml: As long as there are 3 enemies within 12 yards, all of your damage is increased by 20%.
passive.flavorText: "I have two blades, one for each of you." �Blademaster Kharne

passive.name: Juggernaut

passive.descriptionHtml: The duration of control-impairing effects on you are reduced by 50%. In addition, whenever a Stun, Freeze, Fear, or Immobilize is cast on you, you have a chance to recover 20% of your maximum Life.
passive.flavorText: "I swear to you, we put a dozen arrows into him and he just stood back up. These so-called barbarians, these madmen of the north�there is no stopping them." �Soldier of Bastion's Keep

passive.name: Unforgiving
passive.description: You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you generate 2 Fury every 1 second.
passive.descriptionHtml: You no longer degenerate Fury. Instead, you generate 2 Fury every 1 second.
passive.flavorText: "It was as if he suddenly came to know every grievous injury endured by his ancestors, and he had selected that very moment to exact their collective revenge." �Chronicler Arlavoc

passive.flavorText: The aid of the Immortal King shall come to those who have earned it.

passive.name: Earthen Might
passive.description: Gain 30 Fury when Avalanche or Earthquake is triggered.
passive.descriptionHtml: Gain 30 Fury when Avalanche or Earthquake is triggered.
passive.flavorText: "My capital has become the cell in which I await my execution. The ground roars beneath me, announcing the presence of the wild men, as they rend and tear the foundations of the world and laugh. Oh, woe is me that I ever confused their savage ways for weakness."�Loren, Panep of Samauren

passive.name: Sword and Board
passive.description: While wielding a shield, reduce all damage taken by 30% and reduce Fury costs by 20%.
passive.descriptionHtml: While wielding a shield, reduce all damage taken by 30% and reduce Fury costs by 20%.
passive.flavorText: "Turning away the attack of an enemy saps their resolve as surely as landing a blow of your own." �Battlemaster Kal-Jor

passive.flavorText: "The battle was never ending, sapping our minds and bodies to the point of exhaustion. But they thrived amidst the carnage, every killing blow renewing their bloodlust. They couldn't be stopped." �Sergeant Peshkov on the Siege of the Barbarians, 1123 Anno Kehjistani
